resources.string:
We are a group of five students from the Nikola Tesla STEM High School on a mission to educate the world about one of the most valuable, and threatened, water sources on our planet: the aquifer.
 
Inspired by our own reliance on an aquifer and our familiarity with the measures that must be taken to preserve the health and safety of its water, we have set out to edcuate both our community and a more global one about the importance of aquifers and swales and the effects of human behavior on them.
 
Check out our website to learn more about our education campaign and ongoing efforts: niamu88.wix.com/aquifereducation
